app.title: Ziwe
app.description: Your personal AI life coach. Ziwe helps you achieve your goals through personalized guidance, smart habit tracking, and actionable daily plans tailored to your journey.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Here's how we protect it.

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.content: Ziwe does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. We do not track your activities, collect your personal information, or send any data to external servers. Your privacy is fully protected.

localStorage.title: Local Storage Only
localStorage.content: Ziwe only uses your browser's local storage to save your preferences and settings. This data never leaves your device and is completely under your control. The information stored locally includes:

noThirdParty.title: No Third-Party Tracking
noThirdParty.content: We do not use any third-party tracking services, analytics tools, or external APIs that could compromise your privacy. Ziwe operates entirely within your browser without any external connections.

security.title: Security
security.description: Your data is safe and secure
security.content: Since we don't collect or store any data on our servers, there's no risk of data breaches or unauthorized access to your information. All your data remains securely on your own device.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your information, please don't hesitate to contact us.

q1.question: What is Ziwe?
q1.answer: Ziwe is your personal AI life coach that helps you achieve your goals through personalized guidance, smart habit tracking, and actionable daily plans tailored to your journey.

q2.question: How does Ziwe protect my privacy?
q2.answer: Ziwe doesn't collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All your information stays on your device using browser's local storage. We don't use any third-party tracking or analytics.

q3.question: Can I customize my coaching experience?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Ziwe adapts to your personal goals, preferences, and schedule. You can customize your daily plans, habit tracking, and coaching style to match your needs.

q4.question: How often should I use Ziwe?
q4.answer: We recommend checking in with Ziwe daily for best results. Even a few minutes each day can help you stay on track with your goals and build lasting habits.

contactForm.title: Have More Questions?
contactForm.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you!
contactForm.name: Your Name
contactForm.subject: Subject
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your question or feedback...

vercel.title: Vercel Deployment
vercel.description: One-click deployment to Vercel. Just run a simple command in your terminal to deploy your app to production.

themeProvider.title: Theme Provider
themeProvider.description: Built-in dark mode toggle with system preference detection and localStorage persistence. Based on shadcn's theme implementation using Tailwind's dark mode class strategy.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development. Create beautiful designs without leaving your HTML.

framerMotion.title: Framer Motion
framerMotion.description: Production-ready animation library for React. Create fluid animations with minimal code.

shadcn.title: Shadcn/UI
shadcn.description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Re-usable components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

reactRouter.title: React Router
reactRouter.description: Client-side routing for React applications. Navigate between views without full page reloads.

lucide.title: Lucide React
lucide.description: Beautiful & consistent icon toolkit for React applications. Over 1000 icons available.

customCursor.title: Custom Cursor
customCursor.description: An interactive custom cursor that replaces the default mouse cursor with animated elements that respond to user interactions.
customCursor.hoverText: Hover over elements to see different states

i18next.title: i18next
i18next.description: Powerful internationalization framework with support for multiple languages, plurals, context, and more.
i18next.sampleText: This is a sample text to demonstrate language switching.

toast.title: React Hot Toast
toast.description: Lightweight, customizable toast notifications for React applications. Perfect for showing success, error, or information messages.
